short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block the list of urls selected by the users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block Em allows you to redirect your un-productive and addictive urls to more productive ones.
Simply add copy paste the URL you want to block followed by the one you redirect it to, So next time when you mistakenly go on the page u are addicted to it redirects you to the one you should be focused on.
